CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Complete Delivery stage positioned above or below the Provide Feedback or Rating stage?
SRP.A: The Complete Delivery stage is positioned {above} the Provide Feedback or Rating stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Provide Feedback or Rating?
VE.A: The value of stage Provide Feedback or Rating is {772}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Begin Transportation?
VE.A: The value of stage Begin Transportation is {2076}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Complete Delivery?
VE.A: The value of stage Complete Delivery is {956}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Prepare for Pickup, with a value of {3654}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Provide Feedback or Rating, with a value of {772}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Begin Transportation to stage Complete Delivery?
SC.A: Decreased by {1120} Thousand Shipments from stage Begin Transportation to stage Complete Delivery.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Complete Delivery to stage Provide Feedback or Rating?
SC.A: Decreased by {184} Thousand Shipments from stage Complete Delivery to stage Provide Feedback or Rating.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 2865? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 2865? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Begin Transportation} stage has {2076}, the {Complete Delivery} stage has {956}, the {Provide Feedback or Rating} stage has {772}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 864 and 2865? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Begin Transportation} stage has {2076}, the {Complete Delivery} stage has {956}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Prepare for Pickup to Begin Transportation, or from stage Begin Transportation to Complete Delivery?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Prepare for Pickup} to {Begin Transportation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Complete Delivery to Provide Feedback or Rating, or from stage Begin Transportation to Complete Delivery?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Begin Transportation} to {Complete Delivery} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Begin Transportation to Complete Delivery, from stage Prepare for Pickup to Begin Transportation, or from stage Complete Delivery to Provide Feedback or Rating?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Prepare for Pickup} to stage {Begin Transportation} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Prepare for Pickup} and {Begin Transportation} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Complete Delivery} and {Provide Feedback or Rating} stages.
